Plot: Abandoned by his father, a young boy is left in a state-run youth farm. In a random act of kindness, the town hair-dresser agrees to foster him on week-ends.
Title: The Kid with a Bike
Actors: Thomas Doret, Cécile De France, Jérémie Renier, Fabrizio Rongione
tomatoConsensus: Thanks to the Dardenne brothers' typically fine direction, The Kid with a Bike is a heart-wrenching, thematically and spiritually rich drama.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 9 wins & 26 nominations.
